name: Canarian Chicken Marinade
description: Simple, aromatic Canarian-style marinade for chicken.

ingredients: 1 tsp dried parsley (or finely chopped fresh parsley)

instructions: - Mix all the spices together first.
- Add the olive oil and combine well to form the marinade.
- Coat the chicken thoroughly with the mixture.
- You can cook immediately, but ideally let it marinate for at least 2 hours.
- Fry the chicken in a shallow pan; no extra oil is needed.

culinary: Fresh parsley adds a brighter flavor if available.
For deeper flavor, marinate longer. It also makes it last longer.
serving: Serve with papas arrugadas, rice, a simple salad...
